HOME.HOW_TO_PLAY_TEXT_1: CryptoElections is a game about leading the countries by running an election campaign in cities. The more electorate live the city — the more votes you get. Once you get the majority — you become a president. The aim is to become a president in as many countries as possible.
HOME.HOW_TO_PLAY_TEXT_2: Ο πρόεδρος θα πάρει 1% προμήθεια από κάθε συναλλαγή στη χώρα του.
HOME.HOW_TO_PLAY_TEXT_3: If you are the mayor of the city and someone wants to beat you will get up to 2 times more you paid.
HOME.MAYOR_TEXT_1: Can change the coat of arms of the city and it’s slogan
HOME.MAYOR_TEXT_2: Get the financial compensation from up to 2x if someone displace him
HOME.MAYOR_TEXT_3: Get all the votes from the city to his presidential campaign
HOME.PRESIDENT_TEXT_1: Can change the background of his country on the World Map
HOME.PRESIDENT_TEXT_2: Taxes. Get 1% commission fee from all transactions in his country.
HOME.PRESIDENT_TEXT_3: Μένει στην θέση του μέχρι κάποιος να μην πάρει 50%+1 ψήφους
HOME.ROADMAP_1: Alpha-Release. Early-access for initial users. Invest in campaign and elections mechanics implemented. First 10 countries released. Cities’ initial price - 0.02 eth.
HOME.ROADMAP_2: Beta-Release. New features: World map, list of most influential mayors and Presidents.
HOME.ROADMAP_3: Mayors get power. Mayors will be able to change city’s coat of arms to any picture, and add city slogan that will be visible to everyone.
HOME.ROADMAP_4: Presidents change Worldmap. President will be able to change background to countries that are under his control. President can advertise anything.
HOME.ROADMAP_5: Όλες οι χώρες είναι στο παιχνίδι.
HOME.ROADMAP_7: Main release. Cities crowdfunding platform implemented. Any user will be able to submit local crowdfunding business or charity project, and mayor of the city will choose which project will be crowdfunded in this city.

ACCOUNT.REQUIRE_METAMASK: Το CryptoElections απαιτεί ένα εγκατεστημένο πρόσθετο MetaMask στον περιηγητή σας.
ACCOUNT.METAMASK_LOCKED_TEXT: Απλά ανοίξτε το MetaMask και ακολουθείστε τις οδηγίες για να το ξεκλειδώσετε.
ACCOUNT.WRONG_NETWORK_TEXT: Απλά ανοίξτε το MetaMask και αλλάξτε στο κεντρικό δίκτυο Ethereum.

CARD.TO_WIN: για να κερδίσετε τις δημαρχιακές εκλογές
CARD.SMALLCITY: Πληθυσμός- λιγότερο % του πληθυσμού της χώρας
CARD.MEDIUMCITY: Πληθυσμός- λιγότερο % του πληθυσμού της χώρας
CARD.BIGCITY: Πληθυσμός- περισσότερο από % του πληθυσμού της χώρας

CAMPAIGN.TITLE: Η εκστρατεία μου
CAMPAIGN.INVEST: Επενδύστε στην εκστρατεία σας σε πόλεις και χώρες της επιλογής σας για να κυβερνήσετε ολόκληρο τον παγκόσμιο χάρτη!

NOTIFICATIONS.PRESIDENT: {{ user }} εξελέγη Πρόεδρος του {{ country }}{{ timestamp }}

WALLET.TEXT: Αν κάποιος γίνει δήμαρχος αντί για εσάς, παίρνετε αποζημίωση. Εδώ μπορείτε να δείτε πόσο έχετε:

1.QUESTION: What do I need to play CryptoElections?
1.ANSWER:
Here’s what you need to get started:
A computer or laptop running the desktop version of Chrome or Firefox MetaMask, a digital wallet used specifically with web apps Ether, a form of digital payment that powers CryptoElections.

2.QUESTION: Installing MetaMask, your digital wallet
2.ANSWER:
To use CryptoElections, you will need to install MetaMask, a digital wallet. You will need to put money in it to make your first purchase.
Note: A digital wallet like MetaMask acts like a bank account—treat it with respect and make sure you don’t forget your password or the seed words.

3.QUESTION: Γιατί είναι το MetaMask κλειδωμένο;
3.ANSWER: Περιστασιακά η σελίδα " Η εκστρατεία μου" εμφανίζει μια οθόνη κλειδώματος. Αυτό συμβαίνει επειδή το MetaMask αυτόματα κλειδώνει τον λογαριασμό σας μετά από ένα ορισμένο χρονικό διάστημα. Για να το ξεκλειδώσετε απλώς κάντε κλικ στην επέκταση MetaMask και πληκτρολογήστε τον κωδικό σας πρόσβασης.

4.QUESTION: Επανεγκατάσταση MetaMask
4.ANSWER: Some users need to uninstall and reinstall MetaMask because they’ve experienced a bug. If you kept your seed words, this is very easy! Just delete the extension, reinstall it, and import your twelve seed words. Then you’ll set the password you want to use (this can be the same one you used before or a whole new password).

5.QUESTION: Παίρνετε Ether, το ψηφιακό σας νόμισμα
5.ANSWER:
For U.S. citizens only: you can buy ether (ETH) in MetaMask. ETH is a digital currency that enables our game to run.

For everyone else: you will need to purchase ETH from an exchange, and then transfer the ETH from your exchange wallet to your MetaMask wallet. Unfortunately, you cannot play CryptoElections with only an exchange account.

6.QUESTION: Πως να στείλετε ETH στο MetaMask
6.ANSWER:
For U.S. citizens only: you are able to purchase ETH directly from the MetaMask wallet using the Coinbase widget. This is more convenient and doesn’t require you to create two accounts.
For everyone else: For everyone else: you need to buy ETH from an exchange using normal fiat currency. Copy your MetaMask address by clicking on the large ‘...’ next to your account, then select ‘Copy Address to clipboard’. Go to your exchange, click ‘Accounts’, and select your ETH Wallet and click ‘send’. Paste the MetaMask address in the box with the amount you’d like to transfer.
